name: The Third Time
description:
The Third Time

Note: This was created as an entry in MY FIRST GAME JAM: WINTER 2020, a two week jam for first time game creation. Day 1 of the jam is when I started to learn coding in C#/Unity and this is a result of my 2 weeks of development. This is a VERY early development Alpha build for demonstration purposes only. This is an incomplete and tiny portion of what the final game will eventually become.

-------

New Years Eve 2009

A view of the entire state from it's center. A high point on the west peak.

A castle.

When the clock strikes midnight fireworks would burst in all directions, in all distances. With this realization, you made a choice. To see it for yourself.  To hike the forest hills in the winter darkness.

To do it alone.

"The Third Time" is a surreal 2D horror game based on local folklore with a retro MS-DOS ASCII-inspired aesthetic.
